name: SPIA
description:
(SUPER POWERFUL INDESTRUCTIBLE ARTIFACTS)

You have found a ship containing the 8 original power cores of the solar system, legend says these ancient artifacts could power whole planets and where thought to be lost in space. Your objective is to collect all of the Planetary Artifacts without running out of oxygen.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Movement

Mouse - Camera Control

E - Interact

Space - Jump

Esc - Close Game
